pr_title: dotCMS/core#17872 Double-clicking a Content->Search result on first login takes user to Tasks instead of the content- 5x

timeline.bodyText: Did you try to listen for the double click event and prevent it? https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/dblclick_event
timeline.author: fmontes

replies.bodyText:
mmm, when trying to prevent the double click event, the click event will execute first.
